com.here.android.mpa.search

Class Request<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.android.mpa.search.Request<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Data type for results
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DiscoveryRequest, GeocodeRequest, MediaCollectionPageRequest, PlaceRequest, ReverseGeocodeRequest, ReverseGeocodeRequest2, TextAutoSuggestionRequest, TextSuggestionRequest, TransitSchedulePageRequest

    public abstract class Request<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a base class for a search request.

    • Field Detail

      • BUILDING_ID_REFERENCE_NAME

        public static final java.lang.String BUILDING_ID_REFERENCE_NAME
        Name used to get building identifier references.

        Use DiscoveryRequest.addReference(String) to be able to retrieve the building identifier from the returned PlaceLink (using PlaceLink.getReference(String) ).

        The building identifier can also be retrieved using DiscoveryRequest.addReference(String) and PlaceLink.getReference(String) (or PlaceRequest.addReference(String) and Place.getReference(String)).

        See Also:
        http://places.hybrid.api.here.com/places/static/doc/public/#topics/external-references.html, DiscoveryRequest.addReference(String), PlaceLink.getReference(String), PlaceRequest.addReference(String), Place.getReference(String), Constant Field Values

      • PVID_ID_REFERENCE_NAME

        public static final java.lang.String PVID_ID_REFERENCE_NAME
        Name used to get core POI identifier references.

        Use DiscoveryRequest.addReference(String) to be able to retrieve the POI identifier from the returned PlaceLink (using PlaceLink.getReference(String)).

        The POI identifier can also be retrieved using DiscoveryRequest.addReference(String) and PlaceLink.getReference(String) (or PlaceRequest.addReference(String) and Place.getReference(String)).

        See Also:
        http://places.hybrid.api.here.com/places/static/doc/public/#topics/external-references.html, DiscoveryRequest.addReference(String), PlaceLink.getReference(String), PlaceRequest.addReference(String), Place.getReference(String), Constant Field Values

      • VENUES_ID_REFERENCE_NAME

        public static final java.lang.String VENUES_ID_REFERENCE_NAME
        Name used to get all venues identifier references.

        Use DiscoveryRequest.addReference(String) to be able to retrieve all venues identifier from the returned PlaceLink (using PlaceLink.getReference(String) ).

        The venues identifier can also be retrieved DiscoveryRequest.addReference(String) and PlaceLink.getReference(String) (or PlaceRequest.addReference(String) and Place.getReference(String)).

        This reference name can be used retrieve all the different venues identifiers, namely: Request.VENUES_CONTENT_ID_REFERENCE_NAME, Request.VENUES_DESTINATION_ID_REFERENCE_NAME and Request.VENUES_VENUE_ID_REFERENCE_NAME.

        See Also:
        http://places.hybrid.api.here.com/places/static/doc/public/#topics/external-references.html, DiscoveryRequest.addReference(String), PlaceLink.getReference(String), PlaceRequest.addReference(String), Place.getReference(String), Constant Field Values

      • VENUES_CONTENT_ID_REFERENCE_NAME

        public static final java.lang.String VENUES_CONTENT_ID_REFERENCE_NAME
        Name used to get only venues.content identifier references.

        Use DiscoveryRequest.addReference(String) to be able to retrieve the venues.content identifier from the returned PlaceLink (using PlaceLink.getReference(String) ).

        The venues.content identifier can also be retrieved using DiscoveryRequest.addReference(String) and PlaceLink.getReference(String) (or PlaceRequest.addReference(String) and Place.getReference(String)).

        See Also:
        http://places.hybrid.api.here.com/places/static/doc/public/#topics/external-references.html, DiscoveryRequest.addReference(String), PlaceLink.getReference(String), PlaceRequest.addReference(String), Place.getReference(String), Constant Field Values

      • VENUES_DESTINATION_ID_REFERENCE_NAME

        public static final java.lang.String VENUES_DESTINATION_ID_REFERENCE_NAME
        Name used to get only venues.destination identifier references.

        Use DiscoveryRequest.addReference(String) to be able to retrieve the venues.destination identifier from the returned PlaceLink (using PlaceLink.getReference(String)).

        The venues.destination identifier can also be retrieved using DiscoveryRequest.addReference(String) and PlaceLink.getReference(String) (or PlaceRequest.addReference(String) and Place.getReference(String)).

        See Also:
        http://places.hybrid.api.here.com/places/static/doc/public/#topics/external-references.html, DiscoveryRequest.addReference(String), PlaceLink.getReference(String), PlaceRequest.addReference(String), Place.getReference(String), Constant Field Values

      • VENUES_VENUE_ID_REFERENCE_NAME

        public static final java.lang.String VENUES_VENUE_ID_REFERENCE_NAME
        Name used to get only venues.venue identifier references.

        Use DiscoveryRequest.addReference(String) to be able to retrieve the venues.venue identifier from the returned PlaceLink (using PlaceLink.getReference(String) ).

        The venues.venue identifier can also be retrieved using DiscoveryRequest.addReference(String) and PlaceLink.getReference(String) (or PlaceRequest.addReference(String) and Place.getReference(String)).

        See Also:
        http://places.hybrid.api.here.com/places/static/doc/public/#topics/external-references.html, DiscoveryRequest.addReference(String), PlaceLink.getReference(String), PlaceRequest.addReference(String), Place.getReference(String), Constant Field Values

      • execute

        public ErrorCode execute(ResultListener<T> eventListener)
        Executes an asynchronous request.
        Parameters:
        eventListener - A ResultListener passed along with the request to monitor progress
        Returns:
        The ErrorCode representing an appropriate result

      • cancel

        public boolean cancel()
        Cancels any pending results from an invoked request.
        Returns:
        True if the request was canceled successfully, false otherwise

      • getCollectionSize

        protected int getCollectionSize()
        Gets the current collection size being used for request responses.
        Returns:
        The current response collection size
        See Also:
        SearchRequest, ExploreRequest, HereRequest, TextSuggestionRequest, TextAutoSuggestionRequest, GeocodeRequest

      • setCollectionSize

        protected Request<T> setCollectionSize(int value)
        Sets a collection size to be used for request responses. The maximum number of result items in each collection will be limited to this value. The valid value range is [1..100]. The default collection size is 20.
        Parameters:
        value - Desired response collection size size per request.
        Returns:
        This Request object
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if size is out of range.
        See Also:
        SearchRequest, ExploreRequest, HereRequest, TextSuggestionRequest, TextAutoSuggestionRequest, GeocodeRequest

      • addReference

        protected Request<T> addReference(java.lang.String name)
        This function adds the name of a requested reference identifiers to be returned in the results. For example, to retrieve an extruded building identifier, set this value to BUILDING_ID_REFERENCE_NAME.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of reference identifier to retrieve.
        Returns:
        True if name added, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        SearchRequest, ExploreRequest, HereRequest, PlaceRequest

      • getReferences

        protected java.util.List<java.lang.String> getReferences()
        This function returns the names of requested reference identifiers to be returned in the results.
        Returns:
        List of the names of reference identifiers to be returned in the result.
        See Also:
        SearchRequest, ExploreRequest, HereRequest, PlaceRequest

      • setMapViewport

        protected Request<T> setMapViewport(GeoBoundingBox mapViewport)
        The map viewport is a bounding box of the map area currently visible to the user. The viewport can act as an implicit location context in the absence of an explicit location context. To ensure you get the best results possible, you should always set a viewport if there is a map visible to the user.
        Parameters:
        mapViewport - The bounding box of the map area currently visible.
        See Also:
        SearchRequest, ExploreRequest, HereRequest, TextSuggestionRequest, TextAutoSuggestionRequest, GeocodeRequest

      • setForceOffline

        @Deprecated
public Request<T> setForceOffline(boolean enableOffline)
        Deprecated. As of SDK 2.1, this method has no affect. The connectivity mode of MapEngine (which can be controlled using MapEngine#setOnline(boolean)) will dictate the mode used when the Request is invoked.
        Force request to operate in the OFFLINE mode. By default, the connectivity mode of request is controlled by the device. Be aware, OFFLINE request can return limited result details. Results from ONLINE request will provide the best information available. NOTE: For the Online package, this method has no effect. All search requests will executed in the ONLINE mode.
        Parameters:
        enableOffline - OFFLINE mode is enabled if true, ONLINE otherwise.

      • setUserAuthentication

        public Request<T> setUserAuthentication(java.lang.String token)
        Some requests, such as when posting images or reviews, applications must provide an OAuth 2.0 bearer token (obtained from HERE Account) to authenticate the user performing the action. The procedure for obtaining a token is outside of the scope of this documentation. Please refer to the HERE Account Single Sign On (SSO) API documentation for more information.
        Parameters:
        token - The User authentication bearer token.
